properties.name: Application Group Deleted
properties.description: Detects when an application group is deleted from Veeam Backup & Replication. This might indicate unauthorized removal of critical components.
properties.query:
Veeam_GetSecurityEvents
| where instanceId == 30500
| extend Name =  extract("Name=\"([^\"]*)\"", 1, SyslogMessage)
| project
    Date = format_datetime(TimeGenerated, 'dd.MM.yyyy HH:mm'),
    DataSource = original_host,
    EventId = instanceId,
    UserName = user,
    ["Application Group Name"] = Name,
    MessageDetails = Description,
    Severity = SeverityDescription
